thread.title: Bengaluru rains: Airport operations affected,10 flights diverted to Chennai | Tamil Nadu News - News9live
thread.title_full: Bengaluru rains: Airport operations affected,10 flights diverted to Chennai | Tamil Nadu News - News9live

author: Ramkumar
title: Bengaluru rains: Airport operations affected,10 flights diverted to Chennai | Tamil Nadu News - News9live
text: Chennai: Heavy rain in Bengaluru on Thursday night forced ten flights to land in Chennai. However, as the weather cleared early in the morning, the flights took off one by one. Several flights bound for Bengaluru have been diverted to Chennai due to bad weather. Some of the many include Singapore Airlines A350 as well as Etihad B777. Bengaluru airport operations affected Due to heavy rain last night, flights were unable to land in Bengaluru. After this, more than 10 flights have been diverted to Chennai international airport. After a stage, permission was sought to land the flights at Chennai airport which could be nearer to Bengaluru. More than 10 flights scheduled to land in Bangalore landed at Chennai airport after Chennai airport was also given permission. After this, food and water were distributed to the passengers. As the weather cleared in Bangalore, the flights took off for Bengaluru. Flights from places like Delhi, Mumbai, Goa, Hyderabad, Ranchi, Lucknow to Bengaluru landed in Chennai. Friday forecast for Karnataka Widespread light to moderate rains expected across Mandya-Mysuru-Bengaluru-Ramanagara-Tumkuru-Hassan-Chamarajanagara-Kodagu-DK_Udupi Ghats and Chikkamagaluru. Possibility for heavy rains in few places in this zone.
